abilities.description: Maintain cover, make no sound, and don’t move, ONLY detected by mechanical or super-natural means.
ONLY works on people in earshot. Does NOT fool electronic sound detectors. ONLY works on the sense of hearing.
Vampire can move around while staying hidden. User is functionally invisible, per Obfuscate limitations.
Appear invisible/masked when viewed live on screen. When viewed later, image seems blurred.
Appear as a nondescript stranger. Will not fool unexpected or hostile individuals.
User cloaks an inanimate object. People will behave as if object isn’t there unless someones collides with it or it is pointed out.
abilities.length: 1 night, with additional night per point of margin of win.

abilities.description: Activate Cloak of Shadows and Unseen Passage while under direct observation.

abilities.cost: One Rouse Check in addition to the cost of the power extended
abilities.description: The vampire can shelter their companions under the cloak of Obfuscate.
With preparation, vampire can make themselves appear as any build and gender.
Say, “Forget!” Dominated victim forgets the current moment as well as the last few minutes.
With eye contact, issue the victim a single-action command to be obeyed.
abilities.length: No more than a single scene

abilities.description: Issue complex commands to victim. Instructions must be carried out immediately and no conditional actions.
abilities.length: Command is carried out or the scene ends, whichever comes first.

abilities.description: Requires casual conversation. The victim is agitated as inner demons bubble to the surface, drowning out all reason.
Rewrite victim’s memories, keep the victim’s gaze and attention. Verbally describes the victim’s new memories.
Mesmerize: Command remains dormant till triggered. "Submerged Directive" never expires. One suggestion per victim.
Victim now believes anything they do under the influence of Dominate was of their own free will, however absurd.

abilities.cost: 1 Rouse Check in addition to the cost of the power amplified
abilities.description: Command entire gatherings of mortals and/or vampires. Can issue instructions and manipulate memories.

abilities.cost: No additional Hunger cost, but the Humanity cost is potentially severe
abilities.description: Issue commands that directly lead to the harm or death of the victim. Mortals and Vampires, effected with little effort.

abilities.cost: Animal must be feed users' Blood on three separate nights, each requires a rouse check
abilities.description: Get a animal ghoul. Commands require Cha + Animal Ken, DC 2; increase DC for complex commands. 1 famulus at a time.
Roll Resolve + Animalism vs Composure + Subterfuge. Win: hostile terget? if they're kindred/werewolf. Crit: Exact creature + Hunger/Rage level.
Allows for simple communication. Persuade animal: Manipulation + Animalism, DC varies. Summoning: Charisma + Animalism, DC varies.
The vampire can slake additional Hunger from animals. Vampire can consume its famulus, absorbing a sliver of its primary trait.
Lock eyes with target, place bast into temporary slumber. Mortals become apathetic, can't act other than to stay alive.
abilities.length: 1 scene, or a number of turns equal to the test margin plus 1.

abilities.description: Allows user to influence swarms of insects such as flies or roaches. Vampires can adopt swarms as famuli.

abilities.cost: 1 Rouse Check. Free if used on famulus.
abilities.description: Can control animal and use its senses freely, even during the day. Vampire’s body lies immobile as if in torpor.
Power held over beasts is great enough to command flocks and packs as if they were extensions of their own body.
Can project Beast at the moment of terror or fury frenzy, transferring it into a nearby subject, either mortal or vampire.
Senses sharpen to a preternatural degree.
Senses attuned to dimensions beyond the mundane, sense presences otherwise hidden.
Flashes of insight.
Perceive person’s aura as colors. Auras reveal emotional state, Resonance, and supernatural traits.
Tap into senses. User retains their own perceptions. Stranger: requires line of sight to initiate. Long distance: Victim must have user’s Blood.
Touch inanimate object or the ground at a location, sense the emotional residue left by those that handled the object or visited location.
Enters light trance, becomes master of surroundings. Gather information from roughly a city-block sized area.
abilities.length: A few minutes for information gathering, up to a night for vigilance.

abilities.description: Possess mortal body. They can expereince, do anything and go anywhere the subject could.

abilities.cost: One Rouse Check (plus one Willpower vs non-consenting vampires)
abilities.description: Read minds, as well as project their own thoughts into the minds of others.
abilities.length: Roughly one minute per Rouse Check. Increased to a full scene w/ consent.

abilities.description: Altering the properties of some of their own Blood, the user can make it highly corrosive.
By tasting a drop of blood, the user can discern certain basic traits of the one to whom it belongs.
The user can intentionally remove the unlife-giving properties of some of the Blood in another vampire.
The vampire can concentrate their Blood, increasing its potency temporarily.

abilities.dice: Strength + Blood Sorcery vs Stamina + Occult or Fortitude
abilities.description: Blood becomes poisonous, capable of affecting mortals and vampires alike.
abilities.length: The poison remains potent for one scene

abilities.dice: Wits + Blood Sorcery vs Wits + Occult
abilities.description: Opens a wound in a major artery, blood shoots through air to mouth of the user. Mortal acts as if in the throes of the Kiss.

abilities.dice: Strength + Blood Sorcery vs Stamina + Occult or Fortitude
abilities.description: The vampire can transmute their Blood into an extremely aggressive poison, lethal to mortal and Kindred alike.

abilities.cost: 1 Rouse Check and gain 1 (or more) Stains
abilities.description: Boil the blood of a victim in their own veins, causing massive damage and excruciating pain.
Balance and grace. Walk and/or run on ledges and wires. Keep balance on the slimmest of supports.
Can’t defy the laws of nature, perceive events instantly and can react to them with superhuman alacrity.
Their mastery of Celerity now allows the vampire to move and react with dizzying speed.
Closes in on a foe, engaging or escaping in the blink of an eye.
Can run or climb along any surface, including vertical and even liquid mediums.
Blood becomes saturated with the power of Celerity, conveying a part of that power to anyone who drinks of it.
abilities.length: One night; until the next feeding or the vampire reaches Hunger 5

abilities.description: Can aim and throw or fire any weapon at a target as if the target were stationary.
Vampire can strike with fist or melee weapon at such speed that the opponent is unable to defend or take evasive action.
Speed vampire moves catches up with their supercharged perception, allowing them to react to events around them at a moment’s notice.
abilities.length: Roughly one action, as determined by the Storyteller.

abilities.description: Endowed with supernatural endurance, the user can strengthen their physical resolve.
Ability to resist attempts to sway them through mundane charms, coercion, and wiles.
Innate ability to ignore damage that would otherwise inconvenience and even disable others.

abilities.cost: Free (for famulus); One Rouse Check (for other animals)
abilities.description: User shares a small portion of their unnatural toughness with the animals they influence.
Can make themselves temporarily resistant causes of Final Death.
abilities.length: 1 scene or until expired, whichever comes first

abilities.description: User protects thoughts and emotions from supernatural prying.
Blood saturated with the power of Fortitude, conveying a part of that power to anyone who drinks of it.
abilities.length: One night; until the next feeding or the vampire reaches Hunger 5

abilities.description: Blood causes skin to harden, taking on a marble-like sheen that stops almost any blow.
Injuries and impairments now only make user stronger.
User’s unarmed attacks can now do Aggravated Health damage to mortals.
User can jump equal to 3xs their BP vertically, and 5xs horizontally.
Add BP of user to their unarmed damage value + to feats of Strength.
Drain human completely in seconds. Every point of Hunger slaked causes one point of Aggravated Health damage.
User adds their BP to any attempt to rile or incite a person/crowd to violence.
A vampire using this power automatically succeeds on any Skill test to climb a non-metallic surface.
Drinking 1 Rouse worth of Blood from user gifts drinker w/ temporary BP one half of the BP (rounded down) of the donor.
No additional test needed for shockwave. Anyone within 5 meter radius must make a Dex + Ath roll (DC 3).
For one scene the user can inflict Aggravated Health damage to mortals and supernaturals alike while Brawling.
Add Presence to Pers, Perf, or Cha rolls. Resist w/ Comp + Int vs Man + Pres.
User’s Presence added to Int rolls. Attack: Res+Comp roll at DC2. Cannot use both Awe and Daunt.
Mortals, addicted to the kiss. Add Presence to Cha rolls against target. Resist: WP roll. 3 consecutive weeks or get a crit.
Displaying fangs, face predatory, user rolls a contest of Cha + Pres vs Comp + Res.
Have subject’s attention and win contest. Success: user adds dice equal to Presence to Social dp against the entranced subject.
The vampire now only needs their voice to be heard in order to employ Dominate powers.
User concentrates for 5 minutes and thinks of person being summoned, then rolls Man + Prese vs Comp + Int.
People in the presence of the user stare or avert their eyes in fear or submission.
Awe, Daunt, and Entrancement can be transmitted through live feeds via screens or phones.
Red eyes, gives user sight in total absence of light. +2 dice for intimidation against mortals.
With time to prepare no roll is required. Reaction: Wits + Sur vs DC3.
No roll needed. +2 modifier to Brawl, and causes aggravated health damage to mortal. Superficial damage is not halved.
No test is required beyond being on a natural surface. It takes a turn to sink into the surface.
abilities.length: One day or more, or until disturbed.

abilities.description: No test is required and the transformation takes one turn with no other actions.
Grants an additional animal form, same as Shapechange, but user can change their size.
No roll, takes up to 3 turns. Can only be damaged by sunlight, fire, and immaterial supernatural attacks.
Increases Staking diff +3. Requires crit to penetrate in combat. Resist: Rouse and Str + Res (DC5) 1 per hour. Cannot be done at Hunger 5.

abilities.ingredients: A silver cup filled with Blood from the subject. (One Rouse Check’s worth).
abilities.process: User mixes their Blood with subject’s and repeats an incantation for roughly an hour.
abilities.summary: Expands upon the power A Taste for Blood allowing the user to learn more details about the subject studied.

abilities.ingredients: A living spider.
abilities.process: Fills vial with Blood and crushes spider into it before ingesting. (No Hunger gained.) Only works on themselves; others gain no benefit.
abilities.summary: Gains ability to cling to walls like a grotesque insect or spider.

abilities.ingredients: A pebble of iron ore or a small magnet and a liter of blood from any source in a silver bowl
abilities.process: Blood into bowl, recites chant for an hour for 2 nights. The 'stone' absorbs blood for 3 nights; liquid appears translucent.
abilities.summary: Creating a magical tracker to which the caster always knows the direction as well as general distance.

abilities.ingredients: The burnt bones and feathers of a rooster
abilities.process: Mixes ashes with their own Blood, drawing a circle with the mixture around their place of sleep.
abilities.summary: Allows the caster to awake at any sign of danger, fully alert as if awake during the night.

abilities.ingredients: Nothing apart from the usual requirement of the caster’s Blood.
abilities.summary: Wary Tremere created this ritual to protect themselves from the minions of vengeful rivals.

abilities.ingredients: An object previously possessed by the sire and a silver bowl filled with clear water.
abilities.process: Submerges object in water and lets their Blood drip into the bowl, concentrating upon the last memory of their sire for up to 30 minutes.
abilities.summary: Uses bond between sire and childe to open a bridge between minds, creates telepathic link for long-distance communication.

abilities.ingredients: A fresh eye and tongue of a person
abilities.process: Ingredients fresh from the victim, vampire chews and swallows them. (This most likely incurs a Stain.)
abilities.summary: Ingest the tongue and an eye of a person, gain the ability to read and speak any language known by the victim.

abilities.ingredients: A white satin ribbon.
abilities.process: The performer of the ritual soaks the ribbon in their own Blood, setting it alight.
abilities.summary: Caster can perceive previous whereabouts of a designated person as a subtly glowing trail, visible only to them.

abilities.ingredients: One pint of blood from the subject.
abilities.process: Mixes their own Blood with that of the subject in a vessel large enough to allow for the dipping of the finger.
abilities.summary: Ritual creates a mystic potion capable of sifting lies from truth.

abilities.ingredients: A handful of salt (in some versions, a handful of brick dust) mixed with the Blood.
abilities.summary: Wards item against incorporeal beings. Any attempt by them to manipulate or pass through the item triggers the effect.

abilities.ingredients: The caster draws the Warding circle with a human bone dipped in the blood.
abilities.summary: This Ritual creates a circular Ward on the floor or ground, intended to prevent the passage of ghouls.

abilities.ingredients: A gold inlaid ceremonial dagger.
abilities.process: Must be exposed the caster’s Blood. Min 1 hour, Max 1 week. Caster pierces their own skin with the ceremonial dagger.
abilities.summary: User ruptures the blood vessels of the victim.

abilities.ingredients: Wood splinters or shavings.
abilities.process: Mixes shavings with their Blood and draws a circle around themselves. Meditate in circle for an hour, then place wooden splinter under their tongue.
abilities.summary: Protects themselves from being staked. Stake shatters before penetrating the skin.

abilities.ingredients: Leaves and berries of belladonna.
abilities.process: Steeps belladonna in their Blood, reducing the brew over a brazier while incanting words of power.
abilities.summary: Potion that when imbibed allows for limited flight.

abilities.ingredients: A fingertip of the caster.
abilities.process: Cuts one of their fingertips off and burns it together with their Blood in a golden chalice or bowl.
abilities.summary: Make themselves and even their comrades resistant to fire.

abilities.ingredients: A handful of silver dust mixed with the Blood.
abilities.summary: Wards item against werewolves, in any form. Any attempt by them to touch the item triggers the effect.

abilities.ingredients: The caster draws the Warding circle with an iron knife dipped in salt and Blood.
abilities.summary: Circular Ward on the floor or ground, prevent passage of spirits.

abilities.ingredients: Nothing but the Blood of the caster.
abilities.process: Inscribes a number of sigils and glyphs on and around the area to be protected.
abilities.summary: Can ward their haven against the sun itself.

abilities.ingredients: The eyes of the bird used, taken at the conclusion of the Ritual.
abilities.process: The caster feeds their Blood to the bird and enters a trance.
abilities.summary: Possess a carnivorous fowl, directing its flight and seeing through its eyes.

abilities.ingredients: A mirror.
abilities.process: The caster spills their Blood on the mirror, chanting, and then breaks it.
abilities.summary: Assumes an incorporeal state, able to freely pass through objects and rendered totally immune to physical damage.

abilities.ingredients: Ash from still-burning fire; risk terror frenzy, and cannot complete the night of a terror frenzy.
abilities.summary: Wards an item against all vampires except the caster. Any attempt by them to touch the item triggers the effect.

abilities.ingredients: The caster draws the Warding circle with a silver knife dipped in wolfsbane and Blood.
abilities.summary: This ward uses the standard rules for Warding circles (p. 275).

abilities.ingredients: Two charred circles of approximately a meter in diameter.
abilities.process: Burns circles into the ground or floor with an open flame. 2 hours of chanting per night and 2 Rouse Checks, 3 nights. In total, 12 Rouse Checks of Blood from caster.
abilities.summary: 2 mystic circles in an arduous ritual, caster can instantly travel from one to the other.

abilities.ingredients: A stone slab and a wax candle drenched with the Blood of the caster.
abilities.process: Lies on stone slab with candle on their chest letting it burn down to nothing. 1 Agg damagage + terror frenzy DC3. To reverse process, they must repeat the ritual.
abilities.summary: Ritual turns caster’s unliving heart to stone. This makes them immune to stakes and completely remorseless and cold-hearted.

abilities.ingredients: A stake carved of rowan wood, inscribed with baneful runes.
abilities.process: Drenches stake with 2 Rouse Checks worth of Blood, while blackening it in an oak-wood fire while reading incantations over it. Ritual takes 5 hours to complete.
abilities.summary: Seeks out the heart of the vampire it’s aimed at but actually causes Final Death when reaching its target.

abilities.ingredients: Draw Warding Circle with a rowan wand dipped in the mixture of ash from a still-burning fire and Blood.
abilities.summary: This ward uses the standard rules for Warding Circles (p. 275).

abilities.description: Applies influence of Oblivion on shadows, the user masks their appearance or seems more sinister and threatening.
Close eyes, Upon opening them, irises are black, and they can now see clearly within pitch blackness and see ghosts
Draws upon darkness in user to project shadow and manifest powers. Shadow mimics user, can be distorted.
Summons appendages from shadows within line of sight. Shadows hold victim in place or they are smothered.
abilities.length: One scene or until ended or destroyed

abilities.description: Project senses into any shadow within line of sight, seeing and hearing as if they were hiding in it.
Channels power through their vitae and energy makes contact with a victim through physical touch.
Seen as a shadow expanding over every surface in the area. Struggle to see and hear their surroundings.
User disappears only to reappear from the same or another shadow further away.
Becomes shadow, able to slither over surfaces and through gaps and cracks. Harmed by fire and sunlight.
